name: Small Crisis
description:
It's Christmas again.

For someone like Small Friend, this naturally means rushing around the woods at night and collecting the presents that seemingly... Materialize there.

But of course, things aren't as convenient as they seem. A large tribe of Maniac Crunguses are intending to slaughter our miniature protagonist.

Will Small Friend manage to jump over the maniacs and collect the presents? Chances are, no. But will he try? Probably.

---

This game was made in 2 hours to make up for Turkey Blast's late release. We're still working on it! Hopefully everything'll go according to plan.
